cell.paragraph:
This wizard enables you to create a Windows Eiffel Library (
/libraries/WEL/index.html WEL ) Windows application.
cell.heading: 2Navigation
cell.paragraph: To navigate to the desired page, select the page name which is displayed to the left hand side of the window.
To cancel the wizard at any point, select the Cancel button
To complete the wizard, using the current settings, select the Finish button
cell.heading: 2Page content
cell.paragraph: This wizard is comprised of the following pages:

This page displays the current settings that will be used when Finish is pressed.
SystemSettings
windows_only_wizard windows_only_wizard.PNG
This page allows you to modify the type of application that the wizard will generate upon completion. You may select one of the following two options:
Frame Application - Selecting this option will cause the wizard to generate a frame based application. This uses a main window or "frame", which can have menus, subwindows etc.
Dialog Application - Selecting this option will cause the wizard to generate a dialog based application. This uses a sequence of dialogs for the application.
2Generated System
Generated Classes
ROOT_CLASS - The root class of the system which inherits WEL_APPLICATION. There is a single feature, `main_window' which returns the main window of the system (class MAIN_WINDOW) which will be displayed when the application is launched.
MAIN_WINDOW - The main window of the system.
APPLICATION_IDS - Contains application constants.
